description:
Kokonotsu, To, and Saya visit the temple, where they find Hotaru behaving even more strangely than usual. On a separate occasion, Saya reminisces about playing with Kokonotsu when they were in the third grade.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Chou Himo Q to Obajiki to Tokidoki Maken Gumi... / Yogurette to Coconuts to...
Super Himo Q, Ohajiki, and Sometimes Maken Gumi... / Yoguret, Coconuts, And...
Super Lacets Q, Billes Plates et Maken Gummi / Des Yoglets et Coconuts
超ひもQとおはじきとときどきまけんグミ... / ヨーグレットとココナツと...
초히모Q와 구슬치기와 때때로 마켄구미... / 요구렛과 코코넛과...
